name: Google Sticky Navigation
description:
Modifies Google search related services like Web, Images, Videos, Search, News, Books, Blogs and more.
- Two Column Layout; 1. Results 2. Preview
- Sticky Google Bar, Search Bar, Side Bar and Page Navigation footer.
- Auto Hides Side Bar.
- Removes unnecessary links.
additional_info:
Compatibility: Tested on Windows 7, Firefox 11, Chrome 19, Resolution 1920x1080 (1080p)

Known Bugs: none

To Do: Nothing

Update 05/04/2012:
- Rewritten Pager background modification to take less vertical space. Thanks user 14255.

Update 27/03/2012:
- Rewritten style code from scratch to match new Google style update

Update 27/09/2011:
- Fixed style to fit new Google style update.

Update 09/09/2011:
- Initial Beta Release.
